sentence: A salmon is swimming up a river. it hits a wall. dam.
explanation: A dam is a barrier constructed to hold back water.
first_new_sentence: The engineers built a dam to control the flow of the river.
second_new_sentence: The fishermen were disappointed when they couldnt cross the dam after it was damaged.

sentence: What did the fish scream when its tank cracked? dam-it!
explanation: A dam is a structure to hold back water.
first_new_sentence: The government decided to build a dam to create a reservoir for drinking water.
second_new_sentence: The river flooded because the dam gave way during the storm.
